name: Papa Don's Pizzaria
description:
WASD (Movement)   E (Interact)   Q (Drop)   Space (Jump)   LCtrl (Crouch)
Scroll to change item in hand

Come one, come all! There's a piping hot pizza cabal. Tasty tomato, tastes so great when there's murder on your plate.

Become the part-time worker at your local pizza parlor, Papa Don's Pizza, and work the night shift. Are there spooks and scares? Does the game have an end? Can you even actually make a pizza? All these questions and more answered if you play today!

(Windows Operating System Required)
